Text: Save on new COM CDRom training from AppDevHave you thought about moving your Visual Basic applications towards a distributed environment Twotier clientserver applications can only scale so far When they require more resources will you be ready Now is the perfect time to prepare yourself for the inevitable challenge of moving or creating applications for a multitier distributed environment The key to building distributed applications is COM Microsoft has made COM and COM a cornerstone of Windows DNA and Windows NET Learn how to develop distributed applications with AppDevs latest course Creating Distributed Applications for COM Services For a limited time you can get this comprehensive training course in your choice of convenient CDROM or video format for the special price of thats off the list price of Please use Priority Code EB when ordering Presented by industry expert Martin Schaeferle this course is for developers who want to learn how to integrate COM components within a distributed environment using Microsoft Visual Basic Topics include Creating COM component in Visual Basic Learning about COM Services Mastering the Component Services Explorer Working with looselycoupled events Creating ntier distributed architectures Building transactional component with Microsoft SQL Server Implementing security on the middle tier Integrating Microsoft IIS server with COM components Visit com to view the full course outline Place your order by the June course release date and you will save on our COM CDROM or video training Order today at com or call Be sure to use priority code EB to receive your savings HURRY this special off discount expires June Sincerely Jim Willeck AppDev Director of Product Development PS I hope youll take advantage of this limited time offer or pass this information on to someone in your company who can benefit from this valuable COM course RIGHT TO PRIVACY AppDev email is never sent unsolicited You are receiving this email because Introducing JEE training from AppDevDeveloping Enterprise Applications using the Java language is not for the weak at heart What application server should you choose Which tools should you develop in AppDevs new selfstudy Java Enterprise Edition JEE training course featuring industry expert Campbell Gunn will answer these questions and more as you learn to create robust enterprise applications using Java Visit promoEB or read on to learn more about our JEE course and how you can save In this course you will learn to Understand the tools and technologies of the Java Enterprise Edition Software Development Kit SDK Understand how to design and implement an Enterprise Application using the Java Language Use the tools within the SDK to provide rapid development and deployment Understand the characteristics of what makes an enterprise application scalable reliable and secure Use techniques such as transaction management packaging and deployment Understand how the JEE platform can support multiple operating systems such as Red Hat Linux and Microsofts Windows Server products And more Visit promoEB to view a detailed course outline For a limited time you can get our sixvideo JEE course retail priced for JUST thats a savings of Not valid with any other offer JEE videos are scheduled to ship on Hurry this special offer on our JEE training ends on Your satisfaction
